passage: Sean Carroll, a theoretical physicist, has made significant contributions to our understanding of the universe. One of his most famous contributions is the concept of the 'arrow of time,' which explains why time appears to move in a ______ direction.
question: Which choice completes the text with the most logical and precise word or phrase?
explanation: A: 'forward' is the correct answer because the 'arrow of time' concept explains the perception of time as moving in a forward direction.
distractor_explanation: 'circular' is incorrect because the 'arrow of time' concept does not describe time as moving in a circular pattern.
'oscillating' is incorrect because the 'arrow of time' concept does not describe time as moving back and forth or oscillating.
'sideways' is incorrect because the 'arrow of time' concept does not describe time as moving sideways or in any other unconventional direction.
